microservices.name: msa-httpbin
microservices.description: HTTP Request & Response Service. Useful for testing HTTP REST tools.

microservices.name: msa-corpora
microservices.description: A collection of small corpuses of interesting data.

microservices.name: msa-faker
microservices.description: Fake data generator. Can generate names, addresses, phone numbers, etc.

microservices.name: msa-patch-json
microservices.description: Compute a JSON patch to transform a JSON document A into B.

microservices.name: msa-patch-bin
microservices.description: Compute a binary patch to transform a binary file A into B.

microservices.name: msa-patch-text
microservices.description: Compute a text patch to transform a text file A into B.
